title: Solicitor successfully sharing case access with another solicitor in their org (happy path)
specs: S1 - with a solicitor role under an organisation to assign a case role to another solicitor within the same organisation
S2 - with a solicitor role within the same organisation who doesn't have but will receive access to a case from S1
